topic.title: EMS Vital Signs Organizer - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-113)

Contains zero or one [0..1] eMSPatientBloodPressureOrganizer, where its type is EMS Patient Blood Pressure Organizer
Contains exactly one [1..1] EMS Patient Blood Pressure Organizer

Contains zero or one [0..1] eMSPatientBodyTemperature, where its type is EMS Patient Body Temperature
Contains exactly one [1..1] EMS Patient Body Temperature

Contains zero or one [0..1] eMSPatientHeartRate, where its type is EMS Patient Heart Rate
Contains exactly one [1..1] EMS Patient Heart Rate

Contains zero or one [0..1] eMSPatientRespiratoryRate, where its type is EMS Patient Respiratory Rate
Contains exactly one [1..1] EMS Patient Respiratory Rate
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-113)

Contains zero or one [0..1] eMSPatientBloodPressureOrganizer, where its type is EMS Patient Blood Pressure Organizer
Contains exactly one [1..1] EMS Patient Blood Pressure Organizer

Contains zero or one [0..1] eMSPatientBodyTemperature, where its type is EMS Patient Body Temperature
Contains exactly one [1..1] EMS Patient Body Temperature

Contains zero or one [0..1] eMSPatientHeartRate, where its type is EMS Patient Heart Rate
Contains exactly one [1..1] EMS Patient Heart Rate

Contains zero or one [0..1] eMSPatientRespiratoryRate, where its type is EMS Patient Respiratory Rate
Contains exactly one [1..1] EMS Patient Respiratory Rate
